title: 45 Sweet Paragraphs That’ll Make Your Girlfriend Cry

steps.content: “It doesn’t feel like nearly enough to simply say that I love you. I’m head over heels for you. You’re my other half and the person who completes me. Without you, I can’t even imagine what my life would become. There’s nothing I want more than to spend every waking moment by your side.”

“There aren’t many things I can be certain of in life. But one thing I know for sure is that I’m in love with you. I’m in love with your smile, your kind heart, your beauty, your intelligence, and everything in between.”

“I don’t necessarily believe in fate, but something tells me that we were made for each other. The love I feel for you goes beyond what words can describe, and I can only hope that you’re able to feel my deep affection and adoration for you. When we’re together, it feels like nothing in this world could ever break us apart.”

“You may not know it, but I am truly and deeply in love with you. I want to see you be happy every single day of your life, and I’ll do whatever I can to make sure you always have a reason to smile.” [1] X Research source

“I love you more than I ever thought was physically possible. You’re a ray of sunshine in my life, warming me up from the inside out even on the darkest of days. Every day with you is a blessing, and I hope you know just how much I adore you.”

“When you’re next to me, my heart fills with so many emotions I can’t possibly describe. I want to hold your hand and keep you close to me. I want to tell you just how much you mean to me. I want to give you the most amazing gifts and take care of you the way you deserve to be cared for. When I’m around you, I can’t help but lose myself.” [2] X Research source

“I never knew I could find happiness in such small things, like seeing your face light up when you get a package in the mail or hearing you laugh at one of my terrible jokes. I never imagined I could get excited over the idea of just spending a lazy Saturday with you, cuddling on the couch and only getting up when we need food. And I don’t think I ever knew what true beauty and kindness were until I met you.”

“To me, you’re everything good and beautiful that this universe has to offer. When I’m with you, I need to constantly remind myself that I’m not just dreaming. I must have saved a nation in my past life to be able to have someone as amazing as you by my side.”

“You’re the girl of my dreams and more than I could possibly deserve. Your smile lights up entire rooms, your laugh raises everyone’s spirits, and your kindness is something everyone should admire. How did I get so lucky? To this day, I still can’t believe that I get to call you mine.”

“At the end of the day, you’ll always be my girl. You’re the one I’ll always want, and I won’t settle for anyone less. You’re my favorite person, the girl I want to spend every single day with, and the one I’ve found a new home within.”

“You’re my everything. When you’re sad or hurt, my heart feels like it’s being ripped in half, and I want nothing more than to make you smile again. When you’re happy, I feel like I’m soaring above the clouds with you by my side. We share one heart. You are me, and I am you.”

“You’ll never know just how much strength you give me. Even when it feels like the world is pressing down on my shoulders, all I need to do is think of you, your smile, and your warmth to reassure myself that things will be okay. Your existence is a blessing in itself, and it’s what motivates me to work hard and be my best self every single day.”

“You make me feel so loved and safe. When I’m with you, I know that I don’t have to be afraid. I can only hope that you feel the same around me. I may have a ways to go yet, but I’m determined to make sure that you always feel like you’re more than enough. Whatever insecurities or negative thoughts you may be having, I’ll erase every single one of them with sweet words, a warm hug, and a tender kiss.”

“When I see you, I see my past, present, and future all blending together. My love for you has no exact start or finish—it’ll keep going until the end of time. I like to think that my feelings for you have been here since the creation of the universe, just waiting for me to meet you in this lifetime.”

“You came into my life when I least expected it. But I can confidently say that every moment since then has been the best moment of my life. Everything you say, everything you do, and everything you are makes the world a little brighter, and I can’t imagine a life where I never met you.”

“I’m realizing now that I don’t say ‘Thank you’ nearly as much as I should. Thank you for caring for me. Thank you for supporting me when I’m feeling lost and unsure. Thank you for listening to me and offering me a shoulder to cry on. Thank you for loving me.”

“Your kindness and thoughtfulness are a gift to this world and should never be taken for granted. Your tendency to love with your entire heart and look out for others is something I admire. I only hope that one day I can be as amazing, selfless, and warmhearted as you.”

“I can’t tell you how grateful I am to have found you. You’ve brought so much color and brightness into my life. A simple ‘thank you’ will never be enough to tell you just how much I appreciate and love you. All I can do is make sure you receive so much love that your heart is simply overflowing with it.”

“You’re not just my girlfriend. You’re also my best friend, and I’m always so thankful to have someone so trustworthy and kind by my side. I love being able to share everything with you. I love your sarcasm and sassiness, but also your gentleness and compassion. You’re truly a gift to this world, and I hope you never forget that.”

“Thank you for teaching me what true love is. You showed me what it means to be accepting and open-minded, how to simply be there for people instead of always trying to find a solution, and how to always find the positive in any situation. So much of who I am today has come from what you’ve taught me, and for that, I’ll be forever thankful.”

“I know that things might seem difficult right now, but please never forget how loved you are. When you feel like falling apart, know that I’ll be here to put you back together. When you want to cry, remember that I’ll always be ready to dry your tears. You mean so much to me, and I’ll be by your side to support you through everything.”

“You’re so much stronger than you give yourself credit for. There have been so many times when I’m simply blown away by your resilience and determination. When you set your mind on something, you don’t give up, even when the odds are against you. And I’ll always be here to cheer you on. Whatever you need, all you have to do is ask and I’ll be there.”

“It’s okay if you want to cry. It’s okay if you want to scream and shout until your voice gives out. Sometimes the world is unfair and we’re left to just wonder how on earth we’re supposed to keep moving forward. But never think for even one second that you’re alone in this. I’ll be here for you through every high and low. You don’t ever have to be afraid of being left to deal with things on your own, because I’ll make sure you’ll always have a hand to hold.”

“I want to tell you how immensely proud I am of you. You’ve worked so hard and have given so much of your time and energy to achieve your goals. It’s a privilege to know you and be able to call you my girlfriend. And I know for a fact that you’ll continue to go on and do even greater things. I love you so much, and I think you’re absolutely incredible.”

“When I’m feeling lost and unsure of myself, the thought of you and your endless love for me is what keeps me going. I hope that you can find a similar comfort within me during difficult times. Remember that nothing is impossible and that you’re capable of anything and everything. This is just a small bump in the road and soon you’ll be running ahead once again.”

“Everyone told me that a long-distance relationship would never work. But they could never possibly know how much I love you and how determined I am to make you feel my love even if we’re thousands of miles apart. No amount of distance could ever stop me from loving you, and I’ll do everything in my power to remind you of that every single day.”

“Even though we’re not together physically, not a day goes by where I can’t feel you by my side. Just the thought of you is enough to get me through the day. Even though I want nothing more than to hold your hand and never let go, I hope it’s enough for me to just say that I love you more than anything in this world.”
“I hope you know that I would literally cross every single continent in order to be with you. I would climb the highest mountain and swim across the deepest seas just so I could be by your side.”

“Since I can’t tell you these words in person, I’ll just pour all of my feelings into this paragraph. I’m crazy about you. You’re one of the best things that’s ever happened to me, and I’m absolutely head over heels for you. When we finally get the chance to meet in person, I’ll be sure to tell you these things every single day. You deserve to know just how lucky I feel for being able to call you mine.”

“Even though we may be miles apart, there’s not a single moment when I feel alone. Your texts, calls, and gifts make it seem like you’re right next to me. You’re always ready with a comforting or supportive word, and I’ll always be grateful for your kindness and love. You’re one of the most special people in my life.”

“I love you. That’s the very first thing I want you to see when you open your beautiful eyes this morning. As you go about your day today, just remember that you have a person thinking every second about how much they love you and can’t wait to see you.”

“Good morning to the loveliest and most beautiful girl in the world. Even though we’re not physically next to each other at this very moment, I hope you know that I’m thinking of you and missing you with my whole heart. I love you so much and want you to know that I’ll be cheering you on today no matter what happens.”

“As you get ready to face the day, just remember that you are strong and capable beyond what words can describe. Whatever you set your mind to today, rest assured that you’ll achieve it. I hope today brings you happiness, no matter how big or small. I love you so much, and I can’t wait to have you in my arms again.”

“The sun rose this morning just so that it could wish you a good morning. Really, the sun should consider itself lucky to be able to see your beautiful face every single day. Because of you, the birds sing a bit louder, the sunshine feels a bit warmer, and people’s smiles are a bit bigger. I hope you have a wonderful day, and I love you so much!”

“On mornings like this, it hits me all over again how much I want to always wake up next to you. When you’re by my side, mornings feel just a little more soft and sweet. I don’t think I can even remember how my days started when we weren’t together. I wouldn’t trade waking up next to you for anything in the world.”

“Another year with you by my side. Isn’t that incredible? Even though you might be tired of hearing me say it, I’m not going to miss this opportunity to say I love you. I love you more with every second that passes, and I can’t imagine there ever being a limit to how deeply my affection runs for you. Happy birthday to the person I want to spend forever with.”

“Happy birthday to the most beautiful and amazing girl I know. On such a special day like today, I want you to remember just how blessed this world is to have you in it. You’re irreplaceable; a rose amongst a field of dandelions. Here’s to another year of happy moments and memories full of love.”

“It’s your birthday, which means it’s that time of year when I get to make you feel extra special and loved. You deserve nothing but the best, so the best is what I’ll give you. If you wish for the moon, I won’t even hesitate to bring it down to Earth just for you. You’re everything to me, and I hope you never forget that.”

“Happy birthday to the person who brings sunshine everywhere she goes. I hope people realize just how lucky they are to know you and have you in their lives. There have certainly been many nights where I can’t help but think, ‘Wow. I can’t believe she’s really mine.’ I love you, and I hope you never change a single thing about yourself. You’re perfect, amazing, wonderful, and every other positive word you can imagine. Let’s take today to celebrate just how incredible you are.”

“Happy birthday to my partner in crime, my best friend, and my soulmate. Getting to spend an entire day appreciating and spoiling the person who completes me is nothing short of an honor. I hope everyone takes a moment out of their day today to tell you how much they love you and how precious you are to them. As for me, well, I don’t think words can even begin to describe just how important you are to me. If I had to choose between breathing and you, I’d choose to tell you I love you with my last breath. You deserve to know how much you mean to me on this special day.”
“And I’d choose you, in a hundred lifetimes, in a hundred worlds, in any version of reality, I’d find you and I’d choose you.” — Kiersten White [3] X Research source
“Even before we met and long after we’re both gone, my heart lives inside of yours. I’m forever and ever in love with you.” — Crystal Wood

“I love you more than my past. I love you more than the obstacles the present is throwing our way. Because you are my future, and I’m going to love you forever because you are my always.” — Marley Valentine
“If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day, so I never have to live without you.” — A.A. Milne, Winnie-the-Pooh
“You are the friend to whom my soul is attached as to its better half. You are dearer to me than language has the power of telling.” — Frances Burney, Evelina
